SOUTHERN CROSS, by Patricia Cornwell. (Putnam, $25.95.) A former police

BE COOL, by Elmore Leonard. (Delacorte, $24.95.) The former mobster Chili

RANSOM, by Julie Garwood. (Pocket, $24.) In the 13th century, two Scottish

ager's liaison with a math teacher jeopardizes her relationship with her mother.
